meanings.definition: The unburned tobacco left in a pipe after smoking.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa always empties the dottles from his pipe carefully.
meanings.sent2: I cleaned out the dottles from the pipe before putting it away.
meanings.sent3: The dottles in the pipe looked like tiny forgotten treasures.
meanings.sent4: The dottles in the pipe whispered of moments past.
meanings.sent5: The dottles in the pipe smelled of memories and relaxation.

meanings.sent1: She picked up the dottles of glass from the shattered vase.
meanings.sent2: The artist used dottles of colored paper to create a mosaic.
meanings.sent3: The dottles of cake left on the plate tempted the hungry dog.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a scattered puzzle of dottles waiting to be connected.
meanings.sent5: The dottles of sunlight danced through the leaves, creating patterns on the ground.
